title: The Adventures of Kid Combat Volume One: A Secret Lost
description: When teenager Kyle Christensen moves to town, he joins a secret group of Defenders that encounter Artie Jones -- a billionaire tech mogul that is obsessed with The Book of Darkness, a book that can grant him unlimited power . . . Kid Combat has fun adventures, techy gismo stuff, and a high-stakes adventure that is great reading for the whole family!
author: Christopher Helwink
